ResourceHeader.Description: Solar Flare Telescope (SFT)/T2 infrared full-Stokes spectro-polarimeter obtains full-Stokes maps in the lines of He-I 10830, Si-I 10827, and Fe-I 15648, which show the magnetic field information at the heights ranging from the photosphere to the chromosphere.

Instrument.InvestigationName: NAOJ solar full-disk infrared vector magnetogram
